message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. I believe it will be highly valuable to you. I'm asking for $18,000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to offer $15,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $15,000 is too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $16,500?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. I would like to counter with $15,500 for the product. I hope this aligns better with what you're looking for.
